algorithm_technique: In-place modification: partition array into even (0s) and odd (1s), then sort.
problem_summary_simple: Convert even numbers to 0, odd numbers to 1, and then sort the array.
problem_summary_technical: Transforms array by replacing evens with 0s and odds with 1s, then sorts the modified array.
key_insights: The problem can be solved in-place by partitioning the array.
A single pass can count the number of even elements.
The array can then be filled with 0s and 1s based on the count.
